actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to prohibit reimbursement and the payment of rewards for the apprehension of members of the Armed Forces who are classified as absentees, deserters, or being absent without leave.

summary.text: Prohibits the payment of a reward of any amount for the delivery to military control of any person in the Armed Forces classified as an absentee, deserter, or being absent without leave.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit reimbursement and the payment of rewards for the apprehension of members of the Armed Forces who are classified as absentees, deserters, or being absent without leave.
